article: In my profession as an educator and health care provider, I have worked with numerous children infected with the virus that  _  AIDS. They have taught me so many things, but I have  _  learned that great courage can be found in the smallest of packages. Let me tell you about Tyler. Tyler was born  _  with HIV. She  _  him by telling Tyler that she was dying too, and that she would be with him soon  in heaven  . A few days before his death, Tyler asked me to his hospital bed and  _  , "I might die soon.
